text:
Appetizer Combos

Slovak Combo Platter: $25
Includes: Chicken Strips, Onion Rings, Mozzarella Sticks, Jalapeño Poppers, Garlic Toast and Ranch Dip. Serves 3-5 people.
Large Combo: $20
Includes: Chicken Strips, Onion Rings, Mozzarella Sticks, Jalapeño Poppers, and Garlic Toast. Serves 2-4 people.
Pizza & Wings Combo: $15
Includes: Flatbread pizza topped with house sauce, pepperoni, bacon, peppers, and onions, plus a half-pound of wings (choose your flavor).
Appetizers

Large Nacho Platter: $20
Includes: Cheese, bacon, tomatoes, green onions, jalapeños, peppers, plus sour cream and salsa. Serves 3-6 people.
Pound o' Wings: $15
Half a pound of wings. Tell them your favorite flavor: Mild, Medium, Hot, Dry, Cajun, Garlic Pepper, Chipotle, Mango Honey.
Two Pounds o' Wings: $25
Twice the size, not twice the price! Mix or match your flavors.
Mozza Stix: $9
Jalapeño Poppers: $8
Mushroom Caps: $10
Dry Ribs: $10
Chicken Strips: $11
Garlic Toast (2): $4
With Cheese: $6
Salads and Sides

Large Garden Salad: $14
Side Garden Salad: $7
Large Caesar Salad: $15
Side Caesar Salad: $8
Poutine: $11
Onion Rings: $7
Sweet Potato Fries: $8
Deep Fried Chips: $7
House Cut Fries: $6
Side Gravy: $3

Fish 'n Chips: $19

Includes chips (fries) and coleslaw
Chicken Fingers Dinner: $18

Lightly breaded chicken fingers served with fries, coleslaw, and dipping sauce
Perogies Dinner: $12

Served with sauteed onions and bacon, garnished with sour cream
Beef Liver Dinner: $17

Two portions of tender beef liver, topped with bacon, served with mashed potatoes and gravy
Slovak Club: $16

Triple-decker layers of ham, tomato, lettuce, swiss cheese, bacon strips, and crispy chicken breast
Spaghetti & Meatballs: $16

Enjoy a good portion of spaghetti topped with our homemade meatballs and our very own jumbo marinara sauce
Chicken Parmesan: $18

Crispy breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce, melted mozzarella cheese, and oregano, served over a mound of spaghetti
Hot Hamburger: $18

Game like a hot dog, but made Slovak style! Juicy beef patty on a bun with mustard, ketchup, and a dill pickle. Served with fries and coleslaw
Slovak Burger: $11

So good you just may want to take another home to lunch! Our house-made beef patty is topped with coleslaw, sautéed onions, and a dill pickle.
With Fries & Coleslaw: $15
Slovak Chicken Burger: $11

Stuffed with coleslaw, sautéed onions, and mayo.
With Fries & Coleslaw: $15

Tri-Combo: $16

Choose one from each list:
List One:
1/3 Pound of Wings
3 Chicken Strips
Peas
Dry Ribs
List Two:
Mozza Stix
Mushroom Caps
Onion Rings
List Three:
Fries
Onion Rings
Sweet Potato Fries
Nacho Plate: $14

Tri-Colour Nachos
Serves 2-3
Mixed Cheese
Red & Jalapeño Poppers
Diced Tomatoes
Green Onions
Bacon Bits
Sour Cream & Salsa
Sour Cream & Salsa available on request.
name: Slovak Legion
